definition: having a short or shortened tail, large sheepdog with a profuse shaggy bluish-grey-and-white coat and short tail
details:
adjective
- having a short or shortened tail
= example: having a short or shortened tail
= synonyms: bobtailed
noun
- large sheepdog with a profuse shaggy bluish-grey-and-white coat and short tail
- a short or shortened tail of certain animals
= synonyms: bob
